block.p: AVX CORP., Myrtle Beach, S.C., named Kurt Cummings, corporate controller, to the post of chief financial officer, succeeding Donald Christiansen, who is retiring. Also, Carl Eggerding was named chief technology officer.

AMERICA ONLINE, Dulles, Va., named Kimberly Till senior vice president for international operations and general manager at AOL International, based in New York. She had been senior vice president for strategic planning and marketing at the Sony Corporation of America.

AVX CORP., Myrtle Beach, S.C., named Kurt Cummings, corporate controller, to the post of chief financial officer, succeeding Donald Christiansen, who is retiring. Also, Carl Eggerding was named chief technology officer.

AMERICA ONLINE, Dulles, Va., named Kimberly Till senior vice president for international operations and general manager at AOL International, based in New York. She had been senior vice president for strategic planning and marketing at the Sony Corporation of America.
ARRIVAL COMMUNICATIONS, San Francisco, named Kim A. Meyer chief financial officer. She had been principal at Meyer & Associates.
EVOICE INC., Menlo Park, Calif., named Jonathan Fram to the new post of chief executive. He had been president at Net2Phone.
